name: Kraken
skill: One Way Ticket to the Deep Sea
Deals 1315/1615 DMG to all enemies. Decreases targets' speed by 24%/29% for a limited time.
ability: Slightly increases the number of Soulstones recieved from battle and battle reward drop rate

additional_data.description: A spirit of the sea that loves jewels, gold, and silver. She hunts pirates and attacks merchant ships--at least, she used to, but lately there haven't been many pirate ships around so she's on hiatus. She came to the Bureau of the Occult after hearing rumors of another spirit who loves jewels. They say her expression scared the living daylights out of the first spirit agent she ran into.

main: "...Where have all the pirates and their beautiful treasure gone?"
limit_break: "This will help with my treasure collecting..."
